description: This file defines API routes for content management within a FastAPI application, demonstrating role-based access control (RBAC) enforcement. It includes endpoints for listing, creating, and deleting content items, with access restricted based on user roles.

methods.name: list_content
methods.description: Endpoint to list content items with read permissions.

methods.name: create_content
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new content item with write permissions.

methods.name: delete_content
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a content item with admin permissions.
